version.releaseNotes: - Added AddOrUpdateByKey and RemoveByKey to KeyedObservableCollection>TKey, TValue< - Removed ReactiveCommand.CanExecuteObserver property and added new method instead ReactiveCommand.ListenCanExecuteObservable(observable>bool<) - As Unity Finally updated it's released version, we go release.
